text:
Nadia Lutfi or Nadia Loutfi (; born Poula Mohamed Mostafa Shafiq (); 3 January 1937 – 4 February 2020) was an Egyptian actress. Her best known roles were "The Night of Counting the Years" and "Saladin the Victorious".
Lutfi died on 4 February 2020 at a hospital in Cairo at the age of 83.

annotations.surface_form: The Night of Counting the Years
